scripts.plan: npm run load-env && npm run build && npm run check-auth && cdk synth --profile tmsandbox -c user_initials=RK
scripts.apply: npm run load-env && npm run check-auth && cdk deploy --all --profile tmsandbox -c user_initials=RK
scripts.destroy: npm run load-env && npm run check-auth && cdk destroy --all --profile tmsandbox -c user_initials=RK
scripts.diff: npm run load-env && cdk diff --profile tmsandbox -c user_initials=RK
scripts.bootstrap: cdk bootstrap --toolkit-stack-name SMCDK-Toolkit --bootstrap-qualifier SMCDK --profile tmsandbox -c user_initials=RK
